titleStmt.title: Truth triumphant through the spiritual warfare, Christian labours, and writings of that able and faithful servant of Jesus Christ, Robert Barclay, who deceased at his own house at Urie in the kingdom of Scotland, the 3 day of the 8 month 1690.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
